title: Entitled grandmother reaches out to daughter after being estranged for 20 years to meet newborn: 'She suddenly wants to play grandma? I was so angry!'
description: Everyone says that becoming a parent makes you gain a newfound appreciation for your own parents; that is, unless your parent was the prime example of what not to do.Now, baby fever can be all-consuming for a soon-to-be parent or for someone who wants to start thinking about having kids. However, it comes back again when you long to become a grandparent. We see this all the time when older parents apply pressure to their adult kids, demanding for grandchildren at some point in the not-so-distant future. But what happens when you've been estranged from your parents for several years (in this case, decades) and they start coming out of the woodwork wanting grandchildren? Keep scrolling below for this tale of a new mom and her estranged parent.
author: Ben Weiss

text: This lady essentially up and left her daughter two decades ago, and now, she has managed to emerge out of nowhere now that she heard that her. daughter was a new mom. Talk about an emotional whirlwind for the author, who had made peace with the fact that she would have zero communication with her mother for the rest of her life. Now, all those memories and feelings are coming back, coupled with the fact that she's experiencing all the emotions that come with being a new mom on top of everything else. Here's her account of what went down!
